long_description: Equally at home on a quick hike and on the way to the work, the clean and elegant Gregory Sketch 18 pack stows your necessities for a quick hike or daily commute. Internal pocket can be used as a hydration sleeve (sold separately) or to stow tablet or 15-in. laptop. Top zippered security pocket for small items such as phone, wallet or keys; two external, side zippered pockets for small items. Sturdy, padded top grab handle; removable sternum strap. Reflective logo for improved visibility after dark; exterior lash points to clip a bike safety light. Durable materials include 420D nylon on the main body, 840D ballistic polyester on high stress areas and 200D poly on the interior.
short_description: Equally at home on a quick hike and on the way to the work, the clean and elegant Gregory Sketch 18 pack stows your necessities for a quick hike or daily commute.
